attributes.action: Make mobile telephone companies liable for the costs of  mobile to mobile calls abroad when the caller is not informed of the situation, namely that the call is being routed abroad and is therefore liable for EXTORTIONATE CALL CHARGES!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make mobile telephone companies liable for the costs of  mobile to mobile calls abroad when the caller is not informed of the situation, namely that the call is being routed abroad and is therefore liable for EXTORTIONATE CALL CHARGES!
